NOTES: Polite “you”; used with most people unless very close or informal
Used by both genders; also means “I” in informal contexts depending on region
Same word for “he” and “she”; context determines meaning
Adds plural meaning (พวกเขา = they; พวกเรา = we all; พวกคุณ = you all)
Used for animals and objects; casual/rude for people
